reasoning: Genital herpes is chronic/recurrent, prevalence more appropriate than incidence. Global seroprevalence ~13.5% (13,500 per 100k) based on WHO estimates.
source: Looker KJ et al. (2015). Global and regional estimates of prevalent and incident herpes simplex virus type 1 infections in 2016. PLoS One. 10(12):e0143945
